item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Who are we? The processing of any personal data is carried out by or on behalf of Kidderminster Aid in Sickness Fund. Kidderminster Aid in Sickness Fund is a registered charity in England & Wales (No. 210586). We refer to Kidderminster Aid in Sickness Fund throughout this policy collectively as ‘Kidderminster Aid in Sickness Fund’ or ‘KAiSF’. How can you contact us? If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy or our processing of your personal information, please contact:
